bug.author: Ark-kun
bug.summary: ChannelParameter does not retain the type
bug.description: ChannelParameter does not retain the type argument passed to it. This makes retrieving the real type from ComponentSpec instance impossible.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Ark-kun>@Ark-kun</denchmark-link> , Can you please elaborate the issue. Also, Please provide details about what platform you are using (operating system, architecture). Make sure you also include the exact command if possible to produce the output included in your test case. If you are unclear what to include see the issue template displayed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/new/choose>the Github new issue template</denchmark-link> . We ask for this in the issue submission template, because it is really difficult to help without that information. Thanks!

As for now, contains type info: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfx/blob/r0.26.0/tfx/types/channel.py>https://github.com/tensorflow/tfx/blob/r0.26.0/tfx/types/channel.py</denchmark-link>
